Reviews.Title: Best basic phone!
Reviews.Author: lovely.sc
Reviews.Content: If your not a smartphone user and just looking for a phone that has texting , mms and this it! I had this phone for 2 yrs! And i had no problems with it, I have samsung tab 2, so I dont waste money on upgrading phones! Good quality voice sound, good for texting,  and calls!

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G: HSDPA 850 / 1900
Full QWERTY keyboard
2MP camera (1600 x 1200 pixels) + Video
Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP
GPS with A-GPS support, AT&T; Navigator
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Link II P5000 Unlocked GSM QWERTY Cell Phone - Black
